description.en_US: A fun maths puzzle that took the world by storm!

description.ayc: Maya tortuga wakichatawa uka kunaymana rixitanaka wakichiri chimpupana utji uka uñjañanaka wakichata chika
description.da: En skildpasse inspireret af Logo, der tegner farverige billeder med visuelle, programmérbare blokke som kan sammensættes.
description.de: Eine von Logo inspirierte Schildkröte, die mittels visueller Programmierbausteine farbenfrohe Bilder zeichnet
description.en: A Logo-inspired turtle that draws colorful pictures with snap-together visual programming blocks
description.en-GB: A Logo-inspired turtle that draws colourful pictures with snap-together visual programming blocks
description.en-US: A Logo-inspired turtle that draws colorful pictures with snap-together visual programming blocks
description.en_US: A Logo-inspired turtle that draws colorful pictures with snap-together visual programming blocks
description.es: Una tortuga inspirada en Logo que hace dibujos coloridos junto con bloques complementarios de programación visual
description.fr: Une tortue inspirée par le langage Logo, qui dessine des dessins colorés à l'aide de blocs de programmation visuelle emboîtables.
description.hy: Լոգո-ոգեշնչված կրիա, որը նկարում է գունազարդ նկարներ "snap-together" տեսողական ծրագրային բլոկերով
description.id: Kura-kura terinspirasi Logo yang melukis gambar berwarna-warni dengan blok-blok pemrograman visual yang tergabung bersama
description.ne: एउटा चिन्ह-प्रभावित कछुवा जसले सँगै-जोडिने दृश्य प्रोग्रामिङ्ग खण्डहरुका साथमा रङ्गीचङ्गी चित्रहरु बनाउँदछ।
description.nl: Een Logo-geïnspireerd schildpad die kleurrijke plaatjes tekent met samenklik visueel programmeerblokken
description.pap: Un turtugá inspirá pa e logo ku ta traha dibuho kolorido ku blòki di programashon visual ku ta klek den otro
description.pl: Żółw zainspirowany Logo, który rysuje kolorowe obrazki dzięki łączeniu bloków programowania graficznego
description.pt: Uma tartaruga inspirada em Logo que desenha pinturas coloridas com blocos de programação visual
description.quz: Charapachaqa Logo nisqata qhawaspam ruwakurqan hinam sumaq siq'ikunata ruwaspa llimp'in kaqllataq tawqakunatapas ruwarillanmi
description.zh-CN: 一个受Logo启发连接可视化编程块并画有彩色图片的海龟

whats_new.en_US:
ENHANCEMENTS:
* Slight speed up when loading large projects
* Added set_font block
* Added ASCII Art example
* Autosave in GNOME (Sugar version already autosaves)
BUG FIX:
* Set default action (YES) for save in GNOME (Andres Aguirre)

description.ayc: ¡Aka pachana thaqma! Akana maya yatxatäwi ch'amanchasma, yatiqaña uñjäwinaka uñjaña, yatiñanaka ch'amamnchaña katuqaña, pankanaka jakiña, masinakampi jakisiña ukata juk'ampinakampi.
description.da: Surf verdenen! Her kan du lave forskning, se undervisningsvideoer, tage kurser online, finde bøger, skabe kontakt til venner og mere.
description.de: Surfe durch die Welt! Hier kannst du forschen, lehrreiche Videos betrachten, Online-Kurse besucht, Bücher finden, Kontakt mit Freunden aufnehmen und vieles mehr.
description.en: Surf the world! Here you can do research, watch educational videos, take online courses, find books, connect with friends and more.
description.en-GB: Surf the world! Here you can do research, watch educational videos, take online courses, find books, connect with friends and more.
description.en-US: Surf the world! Here you can do research, watch educational videos, take online courses, find books, connect with friends and more.
description.en_US: Surf the world! Here you can do research, watch educational videos, take online courses, find books, connect with friends and more.
description.es: ¡Navega por el mundo! Aquí puedes hacer investigaciónes, ver vídeos educativos, tomar cursos en línea, encontrar libros, conectarte con amigos y mucho más.
description.fr: Navigue sur le Web mondial ! Tu peux faire des recherches, visionner des vidéos éducatives, suivre des cours en ligne, te connecter avec des amis et faire bien d'autres choses encore.
description.hy: Կայքավարել աշխարհը. Այստեղ դու կարող ես կատարել ուսումնասիրություններ, դիտել կրթական տեսանյութեր, մասնակցել համացանց կուրսեր, գտնել գրքեր, հաղորթակցվել ընկերների հետ և ավելին:
description.id: Jelajahi dunia! Di sini Anda dapat melakukan riset, menonton video pendidikan, mengikuti kursus daring, mencari buku, menyambung dengan teman-teman, dan yang lainnya.
description.it: Cavalca il mondo! Qui puoi fare ricerche, guardare video educativi, partecipare a corsi on-line, trovare libri, connetterti ai tuoi amici e molto altro.
description.nah: ¡Xipaxalo ipan tlaltepaktli! Nika uelis tij tlatemos, tikitas ixnextilotl tlen inon kaltlamachtilme, uelis timomomachtis ika sekinok, tipantis amochme, tikamanaltis ika moj uampoxua uan sekinok.
description.ne: संसार हेर! यहाँ तिमीले खोजी गर्न सक्छौ, शेक्षिक भिडियोहरु हेर्न सक्छौ, अनलाईन पाठ्यक्रमहरु लिन सक्छौ, किताबहरु खोज्न सक्छौ, साथीहरुसँग जोडिन सक्छौ र अन्य धेरै कामहरु गर्न सक्छौ।
description.nl: Surf met het internet over de hele wereld! Hier kan je onderzoek doen, leerzame filmpjes bekijken, online lessen volgen, boeken vinden, verbinden met vrienden en meer.
description.pap: Nabegá rònt mundu! Aki bo por hasi investigashon, wak vidio edukashonal, sigui kursonan online, haña buki, konektá ku amigunan i mas.
description.pl: Surfuj po świecie! Tutaj możesz szukać, oglądać edukacyjne filmy, uczestniczyć w kursach online, znaleźć książki, kontaktować się ze znajomymi i o wiele więcej.
description.pt: Navega pelo mundo! Aqui podes fazer investigações, ver vídeos educacionais, fazer cursos online, encontrar livros, ligares-te a amigos e mais.
description.quz: Llapan tiqsimuyupi wanpuy! Kaypiqa imaymanakunamantam yachayta atinki, videokunatapas qhawakunki, takikunatapas uyarikunki, p'anqakunatapas ñawichanki, masiykikunawanpas rimarinakuwaq, huk imaymanakunatapas ruwallawaqmi.
description.zh-CN: 在互联网中冲浪！在这里你可以做研究，观看教育影片，学习在线课程，找书，联系朋友等等。

whats_new.en_US:
ENHANCEMENTS:
* Make bar wedge-shaped to make it easier to tell which direction is 0 vs 1
* Use user colors in barUse black and white bar
* Use user colors in section ball
* Use accelerometer in tablet mode; otherwise, use keyboard
* Four new 'balls': bowling ball, beachball, feather, rugby
* Notify user when a new fraction has been added
* Use images in background
* Add custom background capability
* Take into account expanded toolbars when positioning objects
* Set mime type to image for chooser (custom ball and image)
BUG FIX:
* Replace combo boxes with button palettes
* Finish incomplete migration to GTK3 for custom ball
* Fix issues with collaboration between more than 2 players
* Account for players leaving in collaboration scheme

ENHANCEMENTS:

* Use user colors in barUse black and white bar
* Use user colors in section ball
* Use accelerometer in tablet mode; otherwise, use keyboard
* Four new 'balls': bowling ball, beachball, feather, rugby

* Set mime type to image for chooser (custom ball and image)

* Replace combo boxes with button palettes

* Fix issues with collaboration between more than 2 players
* Account for players leaving in collaboration scheme
